name: Two Halves (PntherArt)
description:
Created for Game a Week 7:  Weird Input

WARNING: This game is extremely buggy and very broken! Enjoy the extra extreme weird to your inputs. 

Controller only <3 also you will need 2 because I am an asshole and didn't get around to working out some sort of keyboard + controller hybrid as an alternative. 

Controls

Left player:

Left analog stick - left leg

right analog stick - left arm

Right player:

left analog stick - right leg

right analog stick - right arm

The rest of the controls depend on the controller! (PS/Xbox)

Pick Up - "X" or "A" 

Put Down - "[]" or "X" 

Interact - "O" or "B" 

Notepad Menu - "Options" or "Menu" 

No attritbutes bc its all self made baby x
